name: Abomination
description: "Foolish rabble! You are beneath me!"

name: Absorbing Man
description: On Reveal: If the last card you played has an On Reveal, copy its text. (if able)

name: Adam Warlock
description: End of Turn: Draw a card if you're winning here. Otherwise, +1 Power.

name: Aero
description: On Reveal: The last card your opponent played moves to this location.

name: Agamotto
description: Game Start: Shuffle 4 Ancient Arcana into your deck.

name: Agatha Harkness
description: Game Start: Draw Agatha. She controls your cards on even turns.

name: Agent 13
description: On Reveal: Add a random card to your hand.

name: Agent Coulson
description: On Reveal: Add a random 4-Cost and 5-Cost card to your hand.

name: Agent Venom
description: On Reveal: Set the Power of all cards in your deck to 3.

name: Agony
description: After you play a card here, merge this into it.

name: Air-Walker
description: When this is destroyed, replace it with a 4-Cost card from your hand or deck.

name: Ajax
description: Ongoing: +1 Power for each card in play afflicted with negative Power.

name: Alioth
description: On Reveal: Remove the text from all unrevealed enemy characters here.

name: America Chavez
description: On Reveal: Give the top card of your deck +3 Power.

name: Angela
description:
After you play a card here,
+1 Power.

name: Angel
description: When one of your cards is destroyed, this flies out of your hand or deck to replace it.

name: Annihilus
description: On Reveal: Your cards with Power below 0 switch sides. Destroy those that can't.

name: Anti-Venom
description: On Reveal: Set the Cost and Power of your deck's top card to 0.

name: Ant Man
description: Ongoing: If your side of this location is full, +4 Power.

name: Apocalypse
description: When you discard this, put it back with +4 Power.

name: Araña
description: Activate: After you play your next card, give it +1 Power and move it to the right.

name: Ares
description: On Reveal: Compare the Power of the top 3 cards of both decks. If your total is higher, +6 Power.

name: Arishem
description: Game Start: Shuffle 12 new cards into your deck. On turn 3, get +1 Max Energy.

name: Armor
description: Ongoing: Cards here can't be destroyed.

name: Arnim Zola
description: On Reveal: Destroy one of your other cards here to copy it at the other locations.

name: Astral Projection
description: On Reveal: Copy the text of an On Reveal card in your hand.

name: Attuma
description: End of Turn: Destroy one of your cards here with less Power.

name: Awesome Andy
description: Activate: Give one of your cards at each other location +2 Power.

name: Baron Mordo
description: On Reveal: The top card of your opponent's deck costs 6 until turn 6.

name: Baron Zemo
description: On Reveal: Recruit a card that costs the least from your opponent's deck to your side of this location.

name: Bast
description: On Reveal: Set the Power of all cards in your hand to 3.

name: Bastion
description: On Reveal: Add copies of your other cards here to your hand. Set their Costs to 2 and Power to 3.

name: Batroc the Leaper
description: When a card moves, follow it to gain +2 Power. (once per turn)

name: Beast
description: On Reveal: Return your other cards here to your hand. They cost 1 less next turn.

name: Beta Ray Bill
description: On Reveal: Shuffle Stormbreaker into your deck.

name: Bishop
description: After you play a card, this gains +1 Power.

name: Black Bolt
description: On Reveal: Discard the card that costs the least from your opponent's hand.

name: Black Cat
description: End of Turn: Discard this from your hand.

name: Black Knight
description: After you discard a card, add the Ebony Blade to your hand with that card's Power. (once per game)

name: Black Panther
description: On Reveal: Double this card's Power.

name: Black Swan
description: Activate: Until the end of next turn, your 1-Cost cards cost 0.

name: Black Widow
description: Activate: Add a Widow's Bite to your opponent's hand.

name: Blade
description: On Reveal: Discard the rightmost card from your hand.

name: Blink
description: On Reveal: Swap the last card you played with a card that costs more from your deck.

name: Blob
description: On Reveal: Merge cards from your deck into this until it gains 13 or more Power.

name: Blue Marvel
description: Ongoing: Your other cards have +1 Power.

name: Brood
description: On Reveal: Add 2 Broodlings here with the same Power.

name: Bruce Banner
description: End of Turn: If you have unspent Energy, 33% chance to HULK OUT!

name: Bucky Barnes
description: When this is destroyed, replace it with the Winter Soldier.

name: Bullseye

name: Cable
description: On Reveal: Draw a card from your opponent's deck.

name: Caiera
description: Ongoing: Your 1 and 6-Cost cards can't be destroyed.

name: Cannonball
description: On Reveal: Move the highest-Power enemy card here away. If you can't, destroy it with a Rock.

name: Captain America
description: Ongoing: Your other Ongoing cards here have +2 Power.

name: Captain Carter
description: Ongoing: Add this card's Power to your back-row cards here. (can't add to itself)

name: Captain Marvel
description:
At the end of the game, move to a location that wins you the
game. (If possible)

description: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards here. +2 Power for each destroyed.

description: On Reveal: Steal 1 Power from each card in your opponent's deck.

name: Colonel America
description: Ongoing: Your other cards here have +1 Power for each turn you've discarded a card.

name: Colossus
description: Ongoing: Can't be destroyed, moved, or have its Power reduced.

name: Copycat
description:
When you draw this, copy the text from the bottom card of your

description: On Reveal: Remove the text from front-row enemy cards here.

name: Cosmo
description: Ongoing: On Reveal abilities won't happen here.

description: You can only play this at locations where you are winning.

description: On Reveal: Each player draws a card.

name: Cull Obsidian
description: You can only play this where you have a 1-Cost card.

description: "Let's move, X-Men."

When this moves to a location,

description: Activate: Destroy an enemy card here with less Power.

On turn 5, you get to see your opponent's plays before you

description: Ongoing: +2 Power for each card in your opponent's deck.

After the next time you play a

You can move this once.
After your opponent plays a card here, steal 1 Power from it.

name: Rocket Raccoon
description: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +4 Power.

name: Rockslide
description: On Reveal: Shuffle 2 Rocks into your opponent's deck.

name: Rogue
description: On Reveal: Steal the text from an enemy Ongoing card here.

name: Ronan the Accuser
description: Ongoing: +2 Power for each card in your opponent's hand.

name: Sabretooth
description: When this is destroyed, return it to your hand. It costs 0.

name: Sage
description: On Reveal: +2 Power for each different Power among all other cards here.

name: Sam Wilson Captain America
description: Game Start: Add Cap's Shield to a random location. Ongoing: You can move Cap's Shield.

name: Sandman
description: On Reveal: Next turn, cards cost 1 more. (maximum 6)

name: Sasquatch
description: Costs 1 less for each card you played last turn.

name: Sauron
description: On Reveal: Remove the abilities from all Ongoing cards in your deck.

name: Scarlet Spider
description: Activate: Add an exact clone of this to another location.

name: Scarlet Witch
description: On Reveal: Replace this location with a new one.

name: Scorn
description:
When you discard this, put it back and give +2 Power to itself and
one of your cards in play.

name: Scorpion
description: On Reveal: Afflict cards in your opponent's hand with -1 Power.

name: Scream
description: When an enemy card moves, steal 2 Power from it. (once per turn)

name: Sebastian Shaw
description: When this permanently gains Power, gain +2 more Power. (wherever this is)

name: Selene
description: On Reveal: Afflict the lowest-Power card in each player's hand with -3 Power.

name: Sentinel
description: On Reveal: Add another Sentinel to your hand.

name: Sentry
description: You can't play this at the right location. On Reveal: Add a -9 Power Void to the right location.

name: Sera
description: Ongoing: Cards in your hand cost 1 less. (minimum 1)

name: Sersi
description: On Reveal: Transform your other characters here into random ones that cost 1 more. (if possible)

name: Shadow King
description: On Reveal: Reset all cards here to their original Power.

name: Shang-Chi
description: On Reveal: Destroy an enemy card here that has 10 or more Power.

name: Shanna
description: On Reveal: Add a random 1-Cost card to each location.

name: She-Hulk
description: Costs 1 less for each unspent Energy last turn.

name: Shocker
description: "I'm gonna blast you!"

name: Shuri
description: On Reveal: If you play your next card at this location, double its Power.

name: Silk
description: After ANY card is played here, move this to another location.

name: Silver Sable
description: On Reveal: Steal 2 Power from the top card of your opponent's deck.

name: Silver Samurai
description: On Reveal: Each player discards the lowest-Power card from their hand.

name: Silver Surfer
description: On Reveal: Give your other 3-Cost cards +2 Power.

name: Silver Surfer First Steps
description: End of Turn: If you're winning this location with an On Reveal card, copy its text.

name: Skaar
description: Costs 2 less for each of your cards that has 10 or more Power.

name: Snowguard
description: On Reveal: Add the Hawk and Bear auroras to your hand.

name: Sparky
description: Activate: Give your card that last moved +3 Power and move it back to its previous location.

name: Spectrum
description: On Reveal: Give your Ongoing cards +2 Power.

name: Speed
description: Ongoing: +1 Power for each turn in which you spent all your Energy.

name: Spider-Ham
description: Activate: Replace the text of a random character in your opponent's hand with "oink!"

name: Spider-Man 2099
description: The first time this moves to any location, destroy an enemy card there.

name: Spider-Man
description: On Reveal: Move to another location and pull an enemy card from here to there.

name: Spider-Punk
description:
You can move this once.
When this moves to a location, steal 2 Power from the highest-Power enemy there.

name: Spider-Woman
description: On Reveal: Afflict all enemy cards here with -1 Power.

name: Squirrel Girl
description: On Reveal: Add a 1-Power Squirrel to each other location.

name: Starbrand
description: Ongoing: Your opponent has +3 Power at each other location.

name: Stardust
description: Ongoing: Cards can’t be added to locations except by playing or moving them.

name: Star-Lord
description: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +4 Power.

name: Stature
description: Costs 1 if your opponent discarded a card this game.

name: Stegron
description: On Reveal: Move an enemy card here one location to the right.

name: Storm
description: On Reveal: Flood this location. Next turn is the last turn cards can be played here.

name: Strange Supreme
description: Gains +2 Power from merging. End of Turn: Merge one of your created cards into this.

name: Strong Guy
description: Ongoing: +6 Power if your hand has 1 or fewer cards.

name: Sunspot
description: End of Turn: Gain +1 Power for each unspent Energy.

name: Super-Adaptoid
description: On Reveal: Steal the text from an enemy Activate card here.

name: Supergiant
description: On Reveal: All cards played next turn don't reveal until the game ends.

name: Superior Spider-Man
description: At the start of each turn, you get +1 Energy if you have any cards with increased Power in play.

name: Super-Skrull
description: Ongoing: Has the Ongoing effects of all enemy cards.

name: Surge
description: On Reveal: Give the top card of your deck -1 Cost and +1 Power. After you play it, repeat this ability.

name: Surtur
description: After you play a card with 10 or more Power, this gains +2 Power.

name: Swarm
description: When you discard this, add two copies that cost 0 to your hand.

name: Sword Master
description: On Reveal: Discard an odd-costed card from your hand.

name: Symbiote Spider-Man
description: Activate: Merge your lowest-Cost card here into this. Copy its text like it just revealed.

name: Taskmaster
description: On Reveal: Set this card’s Power equal to that of the last card you played. (if able)

name: Terrax the Tamer
description: On Reveal: For each location, shuffle a Rock into the losing player's deck.

name: Thaddeus Ross
description: End of Turn: If your opponent has unspent Energy, draw a card with 10 or more Power.

name: Thanos
description: Game Start: Shuffle the six Infinity Stones into your deck.

name: The Ancient One
description: On Reveal: Add Tao Mandala to your hand.

name: The Collector
description: When a card enters your hand from anywhere (except your deck), +1 Power.

name: The Hunger
description: On Reveal: Horde +3.

name: Thena
description: End of Turn: +3 Power if you played (exactly) 2 cards.

name: Phoenix Force
description: On Reveal: Revive one of your destroyed cards and merge this into it. That card can move each turn.

name: The Thing
description: "It's clobberin' time!"

name: The Thing First Steps
description: End of Turn: +2 Power. Once per game, if your side here is full, destroy an enemy card here with less Power.

name: Thor
description: On Reveal: Shuffle Mjolnir into your deck.

name: Titania
description: After ANY card is played here, this card switches sides.

name: Topaz
description: After you play a card here, move it to the middle location.

name: Toxie Doxie
description: On Reveal: Give 2 characters in your hand +2 Power. You can't play them next turn.

name: Toxin
description: On Reveal: Return your other cards here to your hand. +2 Power for each returned.

name: Typhoid Mary
description: Ongoing: Your other cards here have -2 Power.

name: Uatu the Watcher
description: Game Start: You can see the unrevealed locations.

name: Ultron
description: On Reveal: Deploy four 2-Power Drones to each other location.

name: Uncle Ben
description: When this card is destroyed, replace it with Spider-Man.

name: U.S. Agent
description: Ongoing: 4, 5, and 6-Cost cards here have -3 Power.

name: Valentina
description: On Reveal: Add a random 6-Cost card to your hand. Give it -2 Cost and -2 Power.

name: Valkyrie
description: On Reveal: Set ALL cards here to 3 Power.

name: Venom
description: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards here. Add their Power to this card.

name: Victoria Hand
description: Ongoing: Your cards that were created in your hand have +2 Power.

name: Viper
description: On Reveal: One of your other cards here with the lowest Power switches sides.

name: Vision
description: You can move this each turn.

name: Viv Vision
description: At the start of each turn, give all cards in your hand +1 Power if you’re winning here. Otherwise, move this to another location.

name: Vulture
description:
When this card moves,
+3 Power.

name: Warlock
description: Activate: For each unspent Energy, give a card in your hand -1 Cost.

name: War Machine
description: Ongoing: Nothing can stop you from playing cards anywhere.

name: Warpath
description: Ongoing: If any of your locations are empty, +5 Power.

name: Wasp
description: "My secret power is that I get things done."

name: Wave
description: On Reveal: All cards cost a maximum of 4 until the end of next turn.

name: Web Sling
description: On Reveal: Next turn, you can move one of your cards away from here.

name: Werewolf By Night
description: After you play a card, move there to gain +2 Power if it has an On Reveal.

name: White Queen
description: On Reveal: Copy the card that costs the most from your opponent's hand into your hand.

name: White Tiger
description: On Reveal: Add a 9-Power Tiger to another location.

name: White Widow
description: On Reveal: Add a Widow's Kiss to your opponent's side of this location.

name: Wiccan
description: On Reveal: If you've spent all your Energy on previous turns, +2 Max Energy.

name: Wolfsbane
description: On Reveal: +2 Power for each other card you have here.

name: Wolverine
description: When this is discarded or destroyed, regenerate it with +2 Power at a random location.

name: Wong
description: Ongoing: Your On Reveal abilities here happen twice.

name: X-23
description: When this is discarded or destroyed, regenerate it at a random location and you get +1 Energy next turn.

name: Xorn
description: After ANY 3 or 4-Cost card is played here, move it to another location.

name: Yellowjacket
description: On Reveal: Afflict your other cards here with -1 Power.

name: Yondu
description: On Reveal: Banish the card that costs the least in your opponent's deck.

name: Zabu
description: On Reveal: Give each 4-Cost card in your deck -1 Cost.

name: Zero
description: On Reveal: Remove the abilities on the next card you play.

name: Zombie Captain Marvel
description: Activate: Destroy your other cards here to get +3 Power for each. Move to a location you're losing.

name: Zombie Galacti
description: Game Start: Choose 6 other cards in your deck. On Reveal: Transform those cards into copies of this.

name: Zombie Giant-Man
description: On Reveal: Horde +2, then this gains Power equal to your Zombie Horde.

name: Zombie Mister Fantastic
description: On Reveal: Horde +2. Activate: Give 4 of your created cards +1 Power.

name: Zombie Power Man
description: End of Turn: If you're winning here, discard the leftmost card from your hand.

name: Zombie Scarlet Witch
description: After you play a card here, Horde +2.

name: Zombie Sentry
description: On Reveal: Horde +1 for each of your cards at the right location.
